Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a mod that allows you to sort the parts and search for specific parts because I have many mods installed.

Thanks in advance!
I believe you are looking for Part Catalog Allows you to sort the part library. Not sure if it has a search function however.

I believe you are looking for Part Catalog Allows you to sort the part library. Not sure if it has a search function however.

Yes I tried that and it hides the sub assemblies and lots of my important parts are in there. Is there a way to make that appear, and is there a way to make custom logos for the mod tabs without logos?
